<title level="1" right="Action">[Pterosaur Swoop](/Actions.aspx?ID=493) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 74

</column>

---

The pterosaur Flies up to its Speed and makes one beak Strike at any point during that movement.
